channel.title: rvm, on Will Schenk

item.title: asdf as environment manager
item.description: I've switch to using asdf to manage my computers version of different programming environments. This is both a more unified approach to using both nvm and rbenv, since it handles a lot more programming languages, but the implementation is also faster. Installing asdf Go to the asdf getting started page to get the latest version: git clone https://github.com/asdf-vm/asdf.git ~/.asdf --branch v0.8.0 Then add this to your ~/.
